subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: John Lackey outpitched the rookie Jeremy Guthrie to earn his 11th victory, and Vladimir Guerrero threw out Melvin Mora at the plate on the game’s final play to help the Los Angeles Angels defeat the Baltimore Orioles, 4-3.
snippet: John Lackey outpitched the rookie Jeremy Guthrie to earn his 11th victory, and Vladimir Guerrero threw out Melvin Mora at the plate on the game’s final play to help the Los Angeles Angels defeat the Baltimore Orioles, 4-3.
